踳踳踳
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 舛
Связанный символ (и): 舛

踳字的基本解释

踳
chuǎn
古同“舛”，乖违；相背：“趋行踳驰不归善者，不为君子。”

踳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuǎn］
［《廣韻》尺尹切，上獮，昌。］
乖背；错乱。

踳字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踳； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1229第19
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】尺尹切【正韻】尺允切，?音蠢。踳駮，相乖舛。【孝經序】踳駮尤甚。【左思·吳都賦】謀踳駮於王義。　又【玉篇】踳駮，色雜不同。　又【集韻】尺兗切。與舛同。詳舛字註。

踳字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
踳字的起名意思

暂无。

Hesitate
Basic explanation of words
Hesitate
chuǎn
In ancient times, the same "slip", obedience; contrary: "A gentleman is not a gentleman who tends to go and flies and does not return to the good."
Hesitate
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuǎn］
["Guangyun" Chi Yinqie, Shangxi, Chang. ]
Be obedient; confused.
Hesitate
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　踳; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1229 Page 19
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Chi Yin cut [Zheng Yun] Chi Yun cut,? The sound is stupid.踳駮, behave like each other. [Preface to the Scriptures of Filial Piety] 踳駮 is especially true. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Seeking to embark on Wang Yi.　[Jade Chapter] 踳駮, different colors.　[Jiyun] Ruler cut. Same as 舛. Detailed note of the word.
